description: Number of n-covers of a labeled n-set.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^k*C(n, k)*C(2^(n-k)-1, n).Also a(n) = (1/n!)*Sum_{k=0..n} Stirling1(n+1, k+1)*(2^k-1)^n.G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} log(1+(2^n-1)*x)^n/((1+(2^n-1)*x)*n!). - Paul Hanna and _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 16 2008
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 21 2000
